channel.title: CVE Feed for QuantumCloud -- Conversational Forms for ChatBot

item.title: CVE-2023-23981|2024-08-02T10:49:08.969Z -- quantumcloud -- conversational%20forms%20for%20chatbot
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in QuantumCloud Conversational Forms for ChatBot pluginÂ <= 1.1.6 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-34380|2024-06-04T17:42:37.987Z -- quantumcloud -- conversational%20forms%20for%20chatbot
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in QuantumCloud Conversational Forms for ChatBot allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Conversational Forms for ChatBot: from n/a through 1.2.0.
